item.title: Add complete bootstrap to Phoenix
item.description: It has been a while since I make a post and this is my first post in English so be gentle with me :P Since a couple of months I been working in a language called elixir and with his web framework phoenix, I have had a lot of fun with these elements. But sometimes I been struggling with configurations that should be easy maybe I don’t read that carefully or maybe I’m a knucklehead, but whatever the reasone is, I hope this configuration works for you and give you a little help of how configure your Javascripts third parties for your Phoenix application.
